This is a three module lesson plan that covers *microbiology*, *infectious disease*, and *epidemiology*. The content is designed by Megan Lott and Julia Frederick. Two PhD students in the college of Public Health, department of Environmental Health Science at the University of Georiga.  

Here you can find the Georgia Education Standards Associated with these three modules.  

If you have any questions please reach out to us at megan.lott@uga.edu or julia.frederick@uga.edu
